House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating April 4 through 10, 1982, "National Medic Alert Week".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the week of April 4 through April 10, 1982, as National Medic Alert Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating April 4 through 10, 1982, "National Medic Alert Week".
